text: Sun damage, skin cancer, and premature aging are just a few of the reasons we are major proponents of year - round sunscreen usage. And, while we have our go - to sunscreens, we are taking a little extra precaution this year by adding makeup with SPF into our routine. You can never be too prepared, right? On the search to add some more sun protection into our beauty routine, we reached out to a few celebrity makeup artists for their favorite makeup products containing SPF. From protective lip tints that add just the right amount of color to high SPF BB creams that create a barely there layer of coverage, there are plenty of products that fulfill their purpose while also protecting our skin from the sun's harsh rays.
